FuncDef: The reset soc attack-defend statistics command clears statistics on packets that match ACL rules and statistics on packets to which CAR is implemented after they match ACL rules on the attacked interfaces on the board in a specified slot.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before collecting statistics on attacked interfaces over a specified period, run the reset soc attack-defend statistics command to clear the existing statistics.
Configuration Impact
SOC statistics cannot be restored after they are cleared. Exercise caution when running this command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
